definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: But remember this auspicious month comes but once a year.
sentences.chinese: 但要记得，吉庆的斋月，每年只有一次。

sentences.english: Be happy and constantly remind yourself of the blessings in your life.
sentences.chinese: 要幸福快乐，不断以生活中的吉庆提醒自己。

sentences.english: If you want to acquire the possession of both worlds.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要同时获得两世的吉庆美好。

sentences.english: The sprawling campus is pleasant enough but badly dilapidated.
sentences.chinese: 现在校园里洋溢着吉庆，但面貌仍是极度破败。

sentences.english: May Allah reward you and grant you forgiveness in this blessed month.
sentences.chinese: 愿安拉奖赏你，在这个尊贵吉庆的斋月宽恕你。

sentences.english: We fast also to honor the Revelation of the Qur'an in this blessed month.
sentences.chinese: 我们斋戒同样尊重在这个吉庆月份中古兰经的降世。

definition: to accept a life of ease/to enjoy a comfortable retirement
lit. (may the) five blessings descend upon this home (namely: longevity, wealth, health, virtue, and a natural death)/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
variant of 紅運|红运[hong2 yun4]
long-lived people, rich harvests (idiom); stable and affluent society/prosperity
profits pouring in from all sides (idiom)/raking in money/bonanza
lit. gold and jade fill the hall (idiom)/fig. abundant wealth/abundance of knowledge
lit. peace when you come or go/peace wherever you go
to add a son to the family
